name: Track Upwork Jobs from Vollna RSS with Google Sheets Logging and Slack Alerts
description:
## Who’s it for

Freelancers and agencies who track new Upwork leads via Vollna RSS and want clean logging to Google Sheets with instant Slack alerts.

## What it does

Polls a Vollna RSS feed every few minutes, parses each job (title, budget, link, skills, categories), dedupes against your sheet, appends only new jobs, and notifies Slack with a compact alert.

## How it works
	1. Schedule Trigger fires on an interval.
	2. RSS Read pulls new items from Vollna.
	3. Filter (optional) skips non-ASCII titles.
	4. Code node normalizes fields (title/budget split, clean Upwork link, “Posted x mins ago”, etc.).
	5. Sheets Lookup + Compare prevents duplicates by job URL.
	6. Sheets Append writes new rows; Slack posts a job alert.

## Set up
	1. In ⚙️ Config, set: VOLLNA_RSS_URL, GOOGLE_SHEETS_DOC_ID, GOOGLE_SHEET_NAME, SLACK_CHANNEL_ID, EMAIL_TO (optional).
	2. Add OAuth credentials for Google Sheets, Slack, and Gmail (optional).
	3. Create sheet columns: TITLE, BUDGET, UPWORK JOB LINK, CATEGORIES, SKILLS, DATE, JOB DESCRIPTION, POSTED.
	4. (Optional) Adjust polling interval on the Schedule Trigger.

## Requirements
	• Vollna RSS feed URL (your tokenized link)
	• n8n (cloud or self-hosted) with Google Sheets + Slack creds

## Customize
	• Remove the ASCII filter for broader coverage.
	• Swap Gmail/Slack with your preferred notifier.
	• Add keyword filters before appending to Sheets.

nodes.name: Title, Budget, Link, Posted, Date, Job Description, Skills, Categories

parameters.message: ✅ A message was just sent to #n8n-jobs!
parameters.subject: Slack #n8n

parameters.content:
Trigger & Input

Location: Near the Schedule Trigger and RSS Read nodes
Note Text:
Trigger & Input

    Runs every 3 minutes
    Fetches new jobs from Vollna RSS feed

Data Cleaning & Filtering

Location: Next to the Check for foreign characters node
Note Text:
Filter Jobs

    Only allow jobs with English (ASCII) titles
    Prevents non-English/foreign character jobs

Sorting

Location: Next to the Sort node
Note Text:
Sort Jobs

    Sorts jobs by most recent (descending by pubDate)

Data Extraction & Formatting

Location: Next to the Title, Budget, Link, Posted, Date, Job Description, Skills, Categories node
Note Text:
Extract & Format Data

    Splits title and budget
    Extracts Upwork link
    Formats posted date
    Extracts job description, skills, and categories

Duplicate Check

Location: Between Get row(s) in sheet and Compare Datasets nodes
Note Text:
Check for Duplicates

    Looks up job link in Google Sheet
    Compares to avoid duplicate entries

Append to Sheet

Location: Next to Append row in sheet node
Note Text:
Save New Job

    Appends new, unique jobs to Google Sheet

Notification

Location: Next to Send a message node
Note Text:
Slack Notification

    Sends new job alert to #n8n-jobs Slack channel

(Optional) Email Confirmation

Location: Next to Aggregate and Send a message1 nodes
Note Text:
Email Confirmation

    Sends email to confirm Slack message was sent

main.node: Title, Budget, Link, Posted, Date, Job Description, Skills, Categories

data.details: The Filter node can be used to filter items based on a condition. If the condition is met, the item will be passed on to the next node. If the condition is not met, the item will be omitted. Conditions can be combined together by AND(meet all conditions), or OR(meet at least one condition).
